CostReportingCodeType.title: Cost Reporting_ Code
CostReportingCodeType.description:
A character string used to represent or replace a cost reporting value.

Applicable codes:
* 'DEL' - Direct Engineering Labour
* 'DIR' - Direct
* 'DML' - Direct Manufacturing Labour
* 'DRS' - Direct Reporting Subcontractor
* 'DTE' - Direct Tooling and Equipment
* 'DTL' - Direct Tooling Labour
* 'ENO' - Engineering Overhead
* 'ENT' - Engineering Total
* 'FEE' - Fee
* 'FNG' - Fringe
* 'GA' - General and administrative overhead
* 'LAB' - Labour overhead
* 'MAT' - Material overhead
* 'MOO' - Manufacturing Operations Overhead
* 'MOT' - Manufacturing Operations Total
* 'PE' - Purchased Equipment
* 'PP' - Purchased Parts
* 'QCL' - Direct Quality Control Labour
* 'RM' - Raw Materials
* 'TM' - Total Material
* 'TOT' - Total
* 'ZZZ' - Mutually defined
* 'COM' - Cost Of Money
* 'DPO' - Direct Plus Overhead
* 'MR' - Management Reserve
* 'OVR' - Overhead
* 'UB' - Undistributed Budget
